name: Trick AND Treat with Friends Clicker
name_original: Trick AND Treat with Friends Clicker
description:
Trick AND Treat with Friends

Trick AND Treat with Friends is an IDLE/Clicker game.
Click with left mouse button on your neighbour to recive candy.

Spend Candies to Upgrade your costume to get more candies for clicking.

Spend Candies to call your friends and upgrade their costumes to get candies per second.

Max upgrade level = 5.

Modifiers used:
Marshmallow ghosts - Halloween themed, but not scary and no combat.
Costume party - Use dress-up as a theme or mechanic.

Music by:
https://soundcloud.com/sei_peridot/spook4
